FILE_BROKEN: Something went wrong during pasting because of a error in the file.
NO_ACCESS: You don't have the permissions to use this command
SYNTAX_PASTEBACK:
Syntax: /pasteback <Target Filename> <options values>
height XX - Adjust the height
vending - Information and sellings in vending machine
stability <true/false> - Wether or not to disable stability
deployables <true/false> - Wether or not to copy deployables
auth <true/false> - Wether or not to copy lock and cupboard whitelists
position <x,y,z> - Override position
rotation <X> - Override rotation
SYNTAX_PASTE_OR_PASTEBACK:
Syntax: /paste or /pasteback <Target Filename> <options values>
height XX - Adjust the height
autoheight true/false - sets best height, carefull of the steep
blockcollision XX - blocks the entire paste if something the new building collides with something
deployables true/false - false to remove deployables
inventories true/false - false to ignore inventories
vending - Information and sellings in vending machine
stability <true/false> - Wether or not to disable stability on the building
position <x,y,z> - Override position
rotation <X> - Override rotation
PASTEBACK_SUCCESS: You've successfully placed back the structure
SYNTAX_COPY:
Syntax: /copy <Target Filename> <options values>
radius XX (default 3) - The radius in which to search for the next object (performs this search from every other object)
method proximity/building (default proximity) - Building only copies objects which are part of the building, proximity copies everything (within the radius)
deployables true/false (saves deployables or not) - Wether to save deployables
inventories true/false (saves inventories or not) - Wether to save inventories of found objects with inventories.
NO_ENTITY_RAY: Couldn't ray something valid in front of you
COPY_SUCCESS: The structure was successfully copied as {0}
NO_PASTED_STRUCTURE: You must paste structure before undoing it
UNDO_SUCCESS: You've successfully undid what you pasted
SYNTAX_HEIGHT: Option height must be a number
SYNTAX_BLOCKCOLLISION: Option blockcollision must be a number, 0 will deactivate the option
SYNTAX_RADIUS: Option radius must be a number
